name: Glass Presents Table
description: Festive-but-glitchy gifts circulating around the Glass Timekeeper sector. Roll to see what’s inside.

results.name: Synchronization Module (The Real Prize)
results.description: An immaculate brass cylinder tied with a perfect ribbon and etched with Crucible’s initials. This is the exact module needed to repair Glass’s timing mesh.

results.name: Exploding Ornament
results.description: A glittering glass bauble that detonates when jostled: 10-ft burst, 6d6 fire damage (DC 34 basic Reflex).

results.name: Wind-Up Toy Soldier
results.description: A 6-inch soldier salutes and patrols a 5-ft square indefinitely when wound. Can hold a tiny note or key.

results.name: Crumbling Biscuit Tin
results.description: Rock-hard cookies; each counts as an improvised thrown weapon (1d4 bludgeoning, range 10 feet).

results.name: Clockwork Reindeer Antler
results.description: A broken antler humming with static. Single-use: next melee Strike deals +2d12 electricity damage.

results.name: Glass Bauble (Lagging Reflection)
results.description: A mirrored orb shows your reflection a second late. Staring for a round makes you sickened 1 (DC 32 Will negates).

results.name: Toy Drum of Reset
results.description: Beat once to force a reroll of initiative for all creatures at the start of the next round as time ‘snaps’ to a downbeat.

results.name: Bottle of Pine Oil
results.description: Smells like a winter grove; highly flammable. Pouring creates a 5-ft slick; ignites for 2d6 fire for 1 minute.

results.name: Tiny Snow Globe (Shuffle)
results.description: Shows this very room with gifts slightly moved. If broken, all creatures shift 10 ft. in random directions.

results.name: Box of Screws (Wrong Size)
results.description: Exactly the wrong gauge for anything here. Ingenious paperweight; infuriating hardware.

results.name: Mechanical Bird Caroler
results.description: When wound, flies in a straight line, singing a warped carol until it hits a surface. Can trigger sensors at range.

results.name: Spilled Nanite Glitter
results.description: Festive flecks that cling and chew. Affected object/creature takes 1d6 persistent damage (type as GM fits) until cleaned.

results.name: Half-Wrapped Lump of Coal
results.description: Warm and humming. Functions as alchemist’s fire (greater) when hurled.

results.name: Miniature Glass Lens
results.description: Clips over one eye; grants darkvision for 1 hour before fogging permanently.

results.name: Jack-in-the-Box Screamer
results.description: Springs out with a metallic shriek: all creatures within 10 ft. take 2d6 mental damage (DC 32 Will basic).

results.name: Toy Train of Sparks
results.description: Circles the opener, leaving a safe ring of crackling static. While inside the ring, gain a +2 item bonus to Reflex saves (1 minute).

results.name: Tangled String Lights
results.description: Functions once as a tanglefoot bag; then the brittle wiring snaps.

results.name: Music Box of Lag
results.description: Plays a warped lullaby. Creatures within 20 ft. must succeed at a DC 34 Will save or become slowed 1 while it remains open (up to 1 minute).

results.name: Pocket Crucible Log Cylinder
results.description: A short voice entry: “Happy Midwinter. Get back to work.” Contains a coy hint about Glass’s access panel locations.

results.name: Hollow Box of Glyphs
results.description: Empty, but lined with faintly glowing time-glyphs. Studying for 10 minutes grants a clue about Glass’s desynchronization (GM provides).
